SPLASHES: Did you know? "Quarky" is a combination of the words quark and quirky.
Did you know? Splash texts were added 5 months into Quarky Classic's development.
Did you know? When accessing a quark you can't access, you will see a no entry sign... with cat ears.
Did you know? The R74moji option in the emoji picker is actually a quark.
Visste du? Quarky Classic antar at du bruker en moderne nettleser.

ENTER_INVITE_CODE: Enter the invite code for the quark you want to join.
MESSAGE_REQUIRED: Du kan ikke sende tomme meldinger! :D
NOTIFICATIONS_DENIED: Du har avslått Quarky sin forespørsel om å sende deg varsler, så ingen varsler kan sendes...
SETTING_NOTIFICATIONS: Vis varsler for alle nye meldinger
CREDITS_WACKYMODER: WackyModer for the fancier message sender and attachment support
